name: Maria Chen
persona: Maria Chen is a 21-year-old psychology major who maintains a CGPA of 2.84. She is motivated to improve her grades and often sets ambitious goals for herself, but sometimes struggles with self-discipline and managing test anxiety. Maria is persistent and rarely gives up, drawing on her grit to keep moving forward even when courses become challenging. She is working on building better study habits and is optimistic about her ability to succeed academically.
